contents.content: UNIT 05 常用求职信函 Common Application Letters
玛丽在面试结束后，想写封询问函询问面试的结果。

contents.title: 玛丽：杰克，我想我最好主动询问一下面试的结果。
contents.answer: Mary: Jack, I think it's best that I actively ask for the results of interview.

contents.title: 杰克：好主意，这样你就不必担心了。
contents.answer: Jack: That's a good idea! So you don't need to worry about it.

contents.title: 玛丽：我也是这样想的。你认为我给公司写封询问函怎么样？
contents.answer: Mary: I think so, too. What do you think about that I write a letter of inquiry to the company?

contents.title: 杰克：可以的。你可以在网上给应聘单位发一封邮件。
contents.answer: Jack: It's OK. You could send an email to the employer via the internet.

contents.content: 面试后主动关注和询问面试结果是很有必要的。在等待面试结果期间可以通过写邮件或信件的方式来询问面试结果，这就是我们常说的写询问函。

contents.title: 玛丽：好主意！这样既方便又快捷。
contents.answer: Mary: Good idea. It is convenient and fast.

contents.title: 杰克：你可以直接询问结果，不过要有礼貌。
contents.answer: Jack: You could inquire about the results directly, but should be politely.

contents.title: 玛丽：这是当然了。
contents.answer: Mary: Certainly.

contents.title: 杰克：我认为询问函应该写得简短点，如果太长了，我怕招聘者会没时间阅读。
contents.answer: Jack: I think the letter of inquiry should be written briefly. If it's too long, I'm afraid the employer won't have time to read it.

contents.content: 写询问函时，要简明扼要地交代清楚自己写这封询问函的目的。如果是询问面试结果，就要注意写清楚自己是什么时间去公司参加面试的，应聘的是什么职位等其他相关信息。这样方便应聘单位为你查找结果。

contents.title: 玛丽：我想一百字左右应该就足够了。
contents.answer: Mary: I think that about one hundred words are enough.

contents.title: 杰克：询问函发出去后，你要及时关注，以免错失任何回复的信息。
contents.answer: Jack: After you send the letter of inquiry, you should pay close attention not to miss any reply.

contents.title: 玛丽：好的，我知道了。
contents.answer: Mary: OK, I know now.

contents.content: 虽然询问函写不写都可以，但是提倡大家动手写一下。其他人都不写，可你却写了，就会给用人单位留下不一样的印象，说不定本来没有打算录用你，可是看到你态度积极，就会给你一个试用的机会。所以说，机遇是把握在那些有准备的人的手中的，而成功则来源于机遇。

contents.title: 我想知道我的面试结果。
contents.answer: I want to know my interview results.

contents.title: 你说过几天后会通知我面试结果的。
contents.answer: You said you would let me know the results of the interview in a couple of days.

contents.title: 很抱歉打扰你，但是我真的想知道结果。
contents.answer: I am sorry to disturb you, but I really want to know the results.

contents.title: 你没有对我的面试作出答复。
contents.answer: You made no reply about my interview.

contents.title: 我希望你能回复我一封短信。
contents.answer: I hope you can reply me with a short note.

contents.title: 希望你能给我一个明确的答复。
contents.answer: I hope you can give me a clear answer.

contents.title: 我对你们的公司很感兴趣，期望能跟你们一块工作。
contents.answer: I am very interested in your company, and I hope to work with you.

contents.title: 你还记得上星期去你们公司参加面试的那个女孩吗？
contents.answer: Do you still remember the girl who attended your company's interview last week?

contents.title: 我今天就想知道面试的结果。
contents.answer: I wish to know the results of the interview today.

contents.title: 我急切想知道面试的结果。
contents.answer: I am eager to know the interview results.

contents.content: pay close attention to密切关注
